_comment.todo: If a value is not yet available, use: todo
_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO8601 including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.licenses: License name must follow the SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)

fields.name: conversion_factor_iip_steel_crudesteel
fields.description: Commodity-specific conversion factor (multiplication of input and output factors yields the efficiency of the process).

fields.name: conversion_factor_sec_elec_ind
fields.description: Commodity-specific conversion factor (multiplication of input and output factors yields the efficiency of the process).

fields.name: conversion_factor_sec_hydrogen
fields.description: Commodity-specific conversion factor (multiplication of input and output factors yields the efficiency of the process).

fields.name: availability_constant
fields.description: Constant output ratio in relation to installed capacity. (= h/a)

fields.name: capacity_w_abs_new_max
fields.description: Absolute upper bound on level of investment in new weight capacity for a period.

fields.name: cost_inv_w
fields.description: Investment costs for new capacity per unit weight.

fields.name: cost_fix_w
fields.description: Operation independent costs for capacity per unit weight.

fields.name: wacc
fields.description: Percentage of costs for capital after taxes. Used to calculate annuity factor for investment costs.
